description.zh-cn: Stripe 是一个全球领先的在线支付处理平台，支持多种货币和支付方式。它提供了强大的API和工具，帮助商家轻松集成支付功能。
description.en: Stripe is a leading global online payment processing platform that supports multiple currencies and payment methods. It provides powerful APIs and tools to help merchants easily integrate payment functionalities.
